title: The Pillar of Diamonds
info: A heavily-armoured royal guard for the Pillar of Diamonds, fights for peace and has many ways to protect themself.

title: The Cloak of Spades
info: A former spy of the Legion of Spades, the cloak has many creative ways to poison and mame their enemies.

title: The Berserker of Clubs
info: A former sellsword-turned-thief of Galdan's Horde of Clubs, she charges wildly to battle for her own life, and for yours.

title: The Priest of Hearts
info: A devout priest of the Order of Hearts. Trained in the ways of "The Regrowth", he excels in healing magic.
